name: Preserve Grace
components: V, S, F (a silver hand mirror worth 50 gp)
text: The Lantern Bearers must often make difficult decisions during their missions, such as determining what to do with captured enemies—should they be executed, imprisoned, set free, or given a chance to mend their ways? With this spell, you grant a creature the ability to foresee moral consequences, as if the creature were wearing a phylactery of faithfulness. The spell’s guidance focuses on the protection of beauty and encourages peaceful resolution and mercy.
components_zh: 语言，姿势，器材（一面价值50gp的银手镜）
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 掌灯人在执行任务时往往会遇到类似的困境—究竟应该如何对待被俘虏的敌人; 他们应该被处决，监禁，释放或是给予改过自新的机会？你能通过本法术赋予一个生物预知行为影响的能力，就如同她穿戴着虔信经匣（phylactery of faithfulness）一般。这个法术是为了守护美好，怜悯和追求和平的心灵。
